content: निरुध् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To obstruct, stop, oppose, block up; न्यरुंधंश्चास्य पंथानं <ls>Bk. 17. 49</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">16. 20</ls>; <ls>Mk. 1. 22.</ls> {@--2@} To confine, lock up; <ls>Ms. 11. 177</ls>; <ls>Bg. 8. 12.</ls> {@--3@} To cover, hide; <ls>Ms. 10. 16.</ls> {@--4@} To keep off, remove. {@--5@} To curb, restrain, check; <ls>Ś. 7. 10.</ls>
